verses.roman:
prabhura nivedana tāṅre sakala kahila
śuni' śacī jagan-mātā kahite lāgila

synonyms: prabhura—of the Lord; nivedana—submission; tāṅre—unto her; sakala—all; kahila—told; śuni'-hearing this; śacī—mother Śacī; jagat-mātā—the mother of the universe; kahite—to say; lāgila—began.
translation: When they submitted Lord Caitanya's statement, mother Śacī, who is the mother of the universe, began to speak.
